Id.title: Id
Id.description: Read-only. Unique identifier of the QuickBooks object for the address, used for modifying the address.

Line1.title: Line1
Line1.description: Lines 1-5: First five lines of the address.

Line2.title: Line2
Line2.description: Lines 1-5: First five lines of the address.

Line3.title: Line3
Line3.description: Lines 1-5: First five lines of the address.

Line4.title: Line4
Line4.description: Lines 1-5: First five lines of the address.

Line5.title: Line5
Line5.description: Lines 1-5: First five lines of the address.

CountrySubDivisionCode.title: CountrySubDivisionCode
CountrySubDivisionCode.description: Region within a country. For example, state name for USA, province name for Canada.

PostalCode.title: PostalCode
PostalCode.description: Postal code. For example, zip code for USA and Canada

Lat.title: Lat
Lat.description: Latitude coordinate of Geocode (Geospacial Entity Object Code). INVALIDis returned for invalid addresses.

Long.title: Long
Long.description: Longitude coordinate of Geocode (Geospacial Entity Object Code). INVALIDis returned for invalid addresses.

CreateTime.title: CreateTime
CreateTime.description: Time the entity was created in the source domain.

LastUpdatedTime.title: LastUpdatedTime
LastUpdatedTime.description: Time the entity was last updated in the source domain.

Title.title: Title
Title.description: Title of the person. This tag supports i18n, all locales. The DisplayName attribute or at least one of Title, GivenName, MiddleName, FamilyName, or Suffix attributes is required.

GivenName.title: GivenName
GivenName.description: Given name or first name of a person.

MiddleName.title: MiddleName
MiddleName.description: Title of the person. This tag supports i18n, all locales. The DisplayName attribute or at least one of Title, GivenName, MiddleName, FamilyName, or Suffix attributes is required.

FamilyName.title: FamilyName
FamilyName.description: Family name or the last name of the person.

Suffix.title: Suffix
Suffix.description: Suffix of the name. For example, Jr.

DisplayName.title: DisplayName
DisplayName.description: The name of the person or organization as displayed. Must be unique across all Customer, Vendor, and Employee objects. Cannot be removed with sparse update.

FullyQualifiedName.title: FullyQualifiedName
FullyQualifiedName.description: Fully qualified name of the object. System genearated.

CompanyName.title: CompanyName
CompanyName.description: The name of the company associated with the person or organization.

PrintOnCheckName.title: PrintOnCheckName
PrintOnCheckName.description: Name of the person or organization as printed on a check. If not provided, this is populated from DisplayName. Cannot be removed with sparse update.

Active.title: Active
Active.description: If true, this entity is currently enabled for use by QuickBooks.

Taxable.title: Taxable
Taxable.description: If true, transactions for this customer are taxable. Default behavior with minor version 10 and above: true, if DefaultTaxCodeRef is defined or false if TaxExemptionReasonId is set.

TaxExemptionReasonId.title: TaxExemptionReasonId
TaxExemptionReasonId.description: The tax exemption reason associated with this customer object.

Notes.title: Notes
Notes.description: Free form text describing the Customer.

Job.title: Job
Job.description: If true, this is a Job or sub-customer. If false or null, this is a top level customer, not a Job or sub-customer.

BillWithParent.title: BillWithParent
BillWithParent.description: If true, this Customer object is billed with its parent. If false, or null the customer is not to be billed with its parent. This attribute is valid only if this entity is a Job or sub Customer.

Level.title: Level
Level.description: Specifies the level of the hierarchy in which the entity is located. Zero specifies the top level of the hierarchy; anything above will be level with respect to the parent.

Balance.title: Balance
Balance.description: Specifies the open balance amount or the amount unpaid by the customer. For the create operation, this represents the opening balance for the customer. When returned in response to the query request it represents the current open balance (unpaid amount) for that customer.

OpenBalanceDate.title: OpenBalanceDate
OpenBalanceDate.description: Date of the Open Balance for the create operation.

BalanceWithJobs.title: BalanceWithJobs
BalanceWithJobs.description: Cumulative open balance amount for the Customer (or Job) and all its sub-jobs. Cannot be written to QuickBooks.

PreferredDeliveryMethod.title: PreferredDeliveryMethod
PreferredDeliveryMethod.description: Preferred delivery method. Values are Print, Email, or None.

ResaleNum.title: ResaleNum
ResaleNum.description: Resale number or some additional info about the customer.

FreeFormNumber.title: FreeFormNumber
FreeFormNumber.description: Specifies the telephone number in free form.

Address.title: Address
Address.description: An email address. The address format must follow the RFC 822 standard.

URI.title: URI
URI.description: Uniform Resource Identifier for the web site.
